content:
I'm excited to start training for the triathlon! I think it's a great idea to start now and work my way up gradually. I'll definitely need to prioritize rest and recovery, as well as listen to my body and make adjustments as needed. I might consider working with a coach or experienced triathlete to help me develop a customized training plan.

By the way, speaking of customized training plans, do you have any tips on how to create a balanced training plan that incorporates all three disciplines of triathlon training? I want to make sure I'm allocating my time and energy effectively to improve my overall performance.
